location.description: Hospital room is small, dirty, cold and dark.
location.title: Hospital room

location.description: Narrow, cold and dark corridor, walls are gray with a bloody hand prints all over them. It is very long, you cannot see its end, only some blinking, broken light far away.
location.title: Dark corridor

location.description: Small, dark room with a one light board on the wall filled with x rays of people's anatomy, various pictures of bones and a couple of machines, one is like a casket for full body x ray.
location.title: X ray room

location.description: Baby cribs, some of them are pink,some are blue, it seems empty, although there are stuffed animals, one teddy bear is on the floor,pressed with a shelf and plays creepy lullaby.
location.title: Delivery room

location.description: Tight, smelly room with 5 beds, couple of chairs, needles and scalpels on the floor. There is blood on the curtains which are separating each bed.
location.title: Emergency room

location.description: Dark and cold space with one metal bed and a shelf full of bloody operating instruments.Bed is empty, but sheets on the bed are full with blood and sleaze.
location.title: Operating room

location.description: Very big, spacious room, with metal tables, chairs and a lot of windows. In the end there is a long table like a buffet with plates,pots and food leftovers, flies are buzzing around food, it is empty, however some sound of the metal clinging is echoing all over that big space.
location.title: Cafeteria

location.description: Very cold big room space with two metal beds, both with corps on them, covered with white clean sheets
location.title: Morgue

location.description: Light room equipped with glass bottles and instruments with colorful fluids in it. Glass shelfs and a lot of medical supplies.
location.title: Laboratory

location.description: Small, dark space with one light bulb and wooden shelfs filled with various boxes, medicines, pills and small bottles.
location.title: Pharmacy

location.description: One desk with an open notebook and empty chair behind, one broken phone on the floor. Across desk there are 5 chairs and a lot of magazines.
location.title: Waiting Room
